mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.`name`,m.code,m.icon,m.parent_id,m.`type`, case when m.url ='' then '' when m.url is null then '' else CONCAT(s.url,m.url) end as url FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_system s ON m.system_id = s.id WHERE m.is_valid = 1 and m.`type` = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_id

SELECT m.id,m.`name`,m.code,m.icon,m.parent_id,m.`type`, case when m.url ='' then '' when m.url is null then '' else CONCAT(s.url,m.url) end as url FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_system s ON m.system_id = s.id WHERE m.is_valid = 1 and m.`type` = 1 and m.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY m.sort_id

SELECT m.id,m.`name`,m.code,m.icon,m.parent_id,m.`type`, case when m.url ='' then '' when m.url is null then '' else CONCAT(s.url,m.url) end as url FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_system s ON m.system_id = s.id WHERE m.id = #{menuId}

SELECT m.id,m.`name`,m.code,m.icon,m.parent_id,m.`type`, case when m.url ='' then '' when m.url is null then '' else CONCAT(s.url,m.url) end as url FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_system s ON m.system_id = s.id WHERE m.code = #{code}
